actions.description: List of node chaos scenarios to be injected.

node_name.description: Node on which scenario has to be injected. Optional if label_selector is specified.

label_selector.description: Label selector to choose a node when node_name is not specified.

instance_count.description: Number of nodes to perform action/select that match the label selector.

runs.description: Number of times to inject each scenario under actions (on the same node).

timeout.description: Duration to wait for completion of node scenario injection (in seconds).

duration.description: Duration to stop the node before running the start action (in seconds).

cloud_type.description: Cloud type on which Kubernetes/OpenShift runs (e.g., 'bm' for baremetal).

parallel.description: Cloud type on which Kubernetes/OpenShift runs (e.g., 'bm' for baremetal).

kube_check.description: Cloud type on which Kubernetes/OpenShift runs (e.g., 'bm' for baremetal).

bmc_user.description: Default IPMI username for baremetal nodes. Optional if specified for all machines.

bmc_password.description: Default IPMI password for baremetal nodes. Optional if specified for all machines.

bmc_addr.description: IPMI BMC address for the baremetal node. Optional if available via 'oc get bmh'.

bmc_user.description: IPMI username for the specific baremetal node. Overrides the default bmc_user.

bmc_password.description: IPMI password for the specific baremetal node. Overrides the default bmc_password.

bmc_info.description: Per-machine BMC information for baremetal nodes. Optional if no per-machine info is needed.
